14/*! \file */
15
16#include <config.h>
17
18#include <stdbool.h>
19
20#include <isc/bind9.h>
21
22/*
23 * This determines whether we are using the libisc/libdns libraries
24 * in BIND9 or in some other application. It is initialized to true
25 * and remains unchanged for BIND9 and related tools; export library
26 * clients will run isc_lib_register(), which sets it to false,
27 * overriding certain BIND9 behaviors.
28 */
29LIBISC_EXTERNAL_DATA bool isc_bind9 = true;
30
